name: excel-ai-gemini-addin
description: Excel Custom Functions (AI namespace) powered by Google Gemini API (no backend).

scripts.start: concurrently -k "npm run dev-server" "wait-on https://azertiv.github.io/excel-ai-gemini-addin/taskpane.html && office-addin-debugging start manifest.xml desktop --app excel"
scripts.start:web: concurrently -k "npm run dev-server" "wait-on https://azertiv.github.io/excel-ai-gemini-addin/taskpane.html && office-addin-debugging start manifest.xml web --app excel"
